text: You may have noticed that when planting certain plants, they will sometimes appear in different colors, this is because that plant has costumes.
$(br)To remove a costume, you just need to use a White Dye on the plant, but if you want to give a plant a specific costume, you have to use a secret item on the plant.
$(br2)What the secret item is depends on the costume, a good rule of thumb is that the item can be a dye that corresponds to the costume's color,
or an item that references the costume, like a Sword may reference a certain courageous hero...
